title: "Robotics start-up Ubotica Technologies raises €4m in seed funding"
excerpt: "Dublin-headquartered robotics start-up Ubotica Technologies has raised €4 million in seed funding to grow its team and fund the next generation of the CogniSat platform. The round was led by Atlantic Bridge and includes co-investment from US based Dolby Family Ventures and Seraphim Space."
